name: LDPS- The origins (Fahadr)
description:
The torchman needs your help. Something is wrong at the graveyard and he needs your help in investigating what happened at the Graveyard. Do you have what it takes to guide the torchman through the site. jump ontop of your enemies to kill them and try to reach the end...

Click the fullscreen button to get the full experience

A and D to move left to right

Space to jump ontop of enemies
